dg.squash.ecs

Class EntityEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • dg.squash.ecs.EntityEngine

  • public class EntityEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages all the entities as well as collisions in which those entities participate. Collision consist of pair of two entities. Every collision should be defined and put in collision list explicitly otherwise entities will not collide with each other.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EntityEngine()
      Creates default entity engine with empty collision and entity lists.

    • Method Summary

      Checks if entity engine contains an entity with particular name component.

      Removes entity from this engine.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EntityEngine

        public EntityEngine()
        Creates default entity engine with empty collision and entity lists.

    • Method Detail

      • getEntities

        public java.util.Set<Entity> getEntities()
        Returns all the entities in entity engine.
        Returns:
        list of entities

      • getCollisions

        public java.util.Set<Pair<Entity,Entity>> getCollisions()
        Returns all collisions in entity engine.
        Returns:
        list of collisions

      • addCollision

        public void addCollision(Pair<Entity,Entity> collision)
        Adds collision to this engine. If one or both entities doesn't exists in the entity engine, entities will be added in entity list as well.
        Parameters:
        collision - to be added

      • getEntity

        public Entity getEntity(java.lang.String name)
        Returns entity with particular name. If there is no entity with that name or an entity doesn't have name component return null.
        Parameters:
        name - string to look for entity
        Returns:
        entity with supplied name.

      • hasEntity

        public boolean hasEntity(java.lang.String name)
        Checks if entity engine contains an entity with particular name component.
        Parameters:
        name - string to check for entity
        Returns:
        true if this engine contains entity with supplied name, otherwise return false

      • removeCollision

        public void removeCollision(Pair<Entity,Entity> collision)
        Removes collision from this entity engine.
        Parameters:
        collision - to be removed

      • removeEntity

        public void removeEntity(Entity entity)
        Removes entity from this engine. If the entity is part of collision, then that collision will be removed as well.
        Parameters:
        entity - to be removed
